programme.title: Helen Dorn: The Seeds Of Violence
programme.desc: At the Hamburg DOM festival, Helen Dorn and forensic scientist Weyer witness a paramedic's brutal assault. When a high-society boy is later found dead, unravelling a dark secret linking the two cases.

programme.title: Europa
programme.desc: Kamal has fled Iraq to try to enter "Fortress Europe". At the Turkish-Bulgarian border, local mercenaries are ruthlessly hunting down migrants. Alone in the forest, Kamal has three days to escape.

programme.title: Life Feels Good
programme.desc: The true story of Mateusz, a man suffering from cerebral palsy, who in his early childhood had been diagnosed as a retard with no contact with the outside world. After twenty-five years it turned out that he was a perfectly normal and intelligent person.

programme.title: Until Tomorrow
programme.desc: A single mother's courage is tested when she resorts to desperate measures to hide her illegitimate child from her parents.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: The Last Resort
programme.desc: Haunted by a colleague's suicide and grappling with guilt, Helen Dorn confronts the unspoken accusations of her fellow officers. At the same time, she is assigned to solve a medical student's murder, where she soon uncovers their double life.

programme.title: Passenger 23
programme.desc: Martin, a police psychologist who lost his wife and his son during a vacation, receives a call that brings new clues about the disappearance of his family and returns to the same cruise ship to discover the truth.

programme.title: Meisie
programme.desc: A young school teacher is posted to a small rural town, where she meets Meisie, a gifted girl who wants to learn but isn’t allowed to. Before she can teach Meisie, the teacher must first convince her father of the benefits and importance of education.

programme.title: Veins Of The World
programme.desc: After his father dies in a tragic car accident, 11-year-old Amra sets out to continue his father’s vision of the traditional nomad way of life and to continue his fight against global mining companies who threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: Monsoon Baby
programme.desc: After years of failed IVF treatments, Nina and Mark turn to an Indian surrogate. As they anxiously await their baby, the surrogate vanishes, prompting the desperate couple to embark on a frantic search for her and their unborn child.

programme.title: King Of The Belgians
programme.desc: King Nicolas II of the Belgians is on a state visit to Istanbul when his country falls apart. With a solar storm shutting down air travel and communications, he must travel by road across the Balkans to save his country.

programme.title: Playmaker
programme.desc: A former footballer and jailbird, Ivo is no longer interested in football. That is until he meets Lukas, a talented young player, and decides to help him pursue a professional career. But his criminal past soon catches up with him.

programme.title: Road To Your Heart
programme.desc: In this sweet road-trip movie, Basson, a young businessman journeys to Cape Town for his father’s funeral and to fulfill certain tasks in the will. He meets bohemian Amory along the way and they encounter hilarious moments, disappointments and heartaches.

programme.title: Victoria Must Go
programme.desc: Hedvig and Henrik's new stepmother Victoria is annoying and constantly introducing new rules. They decide to hire a hitman to get rid of her, and end up persuading a very reluctant immigrant, Carl, to do the job.

programme.title: Angpao
programme.desc: Michael competes with his brother to get the most Angpaos for Chinese New Year but is one-upped by his brother who received extras from a mysterious man. To beat his rival, Michael must find a way to get Angpaos from the mysterious man too.

programme.title: Tokyo Fianc ée
programme.desc: A charming and tender tale of young love and cultural discovery. Amélie, a Japanophile young Belgian woman in Tokyo falls into a whirlwind romance with Rinri, a Francophile Japanese student.
